title: (x) Babies Movie (2010) Logotype - (similar to) Quanta {Florian}
content:
Hello folks,

Just watched the trailer for the upcoming film "Babies" and it has a fantastic logo/logotype. I'm fairly confident its not a custom job, since several things are typed out in it.

I have attached a couple samples.  
Thanks!

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [Screen shot 2010-02-01 at 10.35.13 PM.png](http://web.archive.org/web/20131012115953/http:/typophile.com/files/Screen%20shot%202010-02-01%20at%2010.35.13%20PM_0.png) | 18.23 KB |
| [Screen shot 2010-02-01 at 10.38.42 PM.png](http://web.archive.org/web/20131012115953/http:/typophile.com/files/Screen%20shot%202010-02-01%20at%2010.38.42%20PM_0.png) | 49.52 KB |
| [Screen shot 2010-02-01 at 10.39.22 PM.png](http://web.archive.org/web/20131012115953/http:/typophile.com/files/Screen%20shot%202010-02-01%20at%2010.39.22%20PM_0.png) | 57.06 KB |
| [Screen shot 2010-02-01 at 10.40.02 PM.png](http://web.archive.org/web/20131012115953/http:/typophile.com/files/Screen%20shot%202010-02-01%20at%2010.40.02%20PM_0.png) | 69.3 KB |
author: danielwilber

comments.content:
Hi Daniel,

it looks like [Canada Type](http://web.archive.org/web/20131012115953/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Canada%20Type)’s [Quanta East and West](http://web.archive.org/web/20131012115953/http:/new.myfonts.com/fonts/canadatype/quanta/?testdrive=dock%3Dfalse%26size%3D52%26w%3D720%26src%3Dcustom%26text%3DTHE%2520BABIES%2520ARE%2520COMING%26fg%3D000000%26bg%3Dffffff%26goodies%3Dfit%252Cot.liga%26seed%3D25) combined, i.e. without the stencil gaps.  
In Quanta’s description, [Patrick Griffin](http://web.archive.org/web/20131012115953/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Patrick%20Griffin) states that it is “[b]ased on yet another undigitized type spotted on a film set”. Maybe there’s a different digitization.  
F

Florian, looks like you've solved the case...  
Thanks for the help!
